title: Why am I banned
body: I just don't get it. I really don't. I've only been suspended once for being "toxic" but right after I get permanently banned? Out of the entire context of the games that happened and I get banned for 2 games where I cussed? I'm sorry but I'm mentally breaking down at how stupid something like this is. from 2 week ban to perma just for cussing and dealing with premade players who just all report me? This is the only game I use to take off my stress and asd now I'm banned over just cussing? There must be some mistake please this is the only thing in my life that takes my stress off.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=TheKinkster,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Zv2PRdiW,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-10-12T01:12:42.449+0000)
>
> I just don&#039;t get it. I really don&#039;t. I&#039;ve only been suspended once for being &quot;toxic&quot; but right after I get permanently banned? Out of the entire context of the games that happened and I get banned for 2 games where I cussed? I&#039;m sorry but I&#039;m mentally breaking down at how stupid something like this is. from 2 week ban to perma just for cussing and dealing with premade players who just all report me? This is the only game I use to take off my stress and asd now I&#039;m banned over just cussing? There must be some mistake please this is the only thing in my life that takes my stress off.

I too play this game to alleviate stress, well it is the only game that can induce a healthy level of adrenalin. I usually don't take these ranting posts seriously, I troll these at work for fun you see. However, I'm going to believe you (something no one should do when it comes to league players, all liars.) permanent ban is usually associated with cheating. Not calling you a cheater, but cussing usually get you chat bans. Unless you went way overboard, in which case maybe this game is not helping you relieve stress so riot did you a favour. XD

To be honest If just got a month chat ban or something more I would gladly take that punishment and that would actually help me learn from my mistake instead of banning me out of the blue for having 4 people report me out of the last 20 games. To be honest I do get heated some times but it's usually only a couple games out of the lot. If you look down I did post my chat logs were I am toxic and trust me I do admit I was pretty pissed but still a perma when nothing the other players said was taken into consideration or at least give a warning when a player is close to getting a punishment. That would be a much more efficient system instead of just banning players out of the blue give them a warning or show them how close they are instead of letting them continue to have bad games where they lose their temper then get banned after. Riot didn't do me a favor as this is my really only stress reliever and I'm not joking when I say this. The only thing Riot did for me is have a panic attack and a mental breakdown.

you seemed to be misinformed about a few things

first, there is no one week ban, the current punishment tiers are 10 game chat ban, 25 game chat ban, 14 day suspension, perma ban

second, a premade has no more power than a solo player when it comes to reports, one report does the same thing that 9 does and NO AMOUNT of reporting will result in punishment if you do nothing wrong

> [{quoted}](name=CharDeeMcDenniz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Zv2PRdiW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-12T01:18:07.976+0000)
>
> you seemed to be misinformed about a few things
> 
> first, there is no one week ban, the current punishment tiers are 10 game chat ban, 25 game chat ban, 14 day suspension, perma ban
> 
> second, a premade has no more power than a solo player when it comes to reports, one report does the same thing that 9 does and NO AMOUNT of reporting will result in punishment if you do nothing wrong

I'm mentally breaking down right now I can't think straight moreaor less type well

If you think that League is causing you a mental breakdown, it sounds to me like you would be better off doing something else than playing League. So you could consider the permanent suspension Riot doing you a favor; you get out of the stressful environment, which causes you problems. Hopefully you find something interesting to do instead of League.

I do agree with you to some extent that league is the only place i'm "toxic" and my life is a constant stressful environment to the point league helps me get through it. The game makes me feel somewhat good at something and not completely garbage (for the most part). And to be honest I've gotten to the point where the smallest thing would have make me mental breakdown due to the pile of stress and bad situations that are on me so yea I guess this was just the last straw that broke the camels back.

Don't think there's a 1 week ban.

If you were recently off a *two week* ban and said/did something that would get you punished, it's a high likelihood that the ban will be a permanent one.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Zv2PRdiW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-12T01:19:09.261+0000)
>

Doesn't matter plus due to how riot doesn't provide the entire log it seems I'm to the toxic fuck... In which reality yea I was mad but compared to the other 4 teammates it's a joke... Maybe Riot should give a warning system instead of just banning you of the blue over 2 games where I just swear?

You are right, the chat log is QUITE toxic if i do say so myself, but you were giving a warning, your 2 week ban was the warning that, if you didn't learn how to behave properly, you will be perma banned.
Your the exact ADC I hate having to support

To be honest I would agree with you but that's the thing I hate with riot. They don't give the full story so yes I admit I got pretty pissed at him but your seeing a one sided story with only my words to fill in the otherside. Believe me or not I'm telling you he was purposely trying to piss/ bait me off and he did it.

> [{quoted}](name=TheKinkster,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Zv2PRdiW,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-12T20:09:40.235+0000)

They don't give the full story so yes I admit I got pretty pissed at him but your seeing a one sided story with only my words to fill in the otherside. Believe me or not I'm telling you he was purposely trying to piss/ bait me off and he did it.

Riot prefers to go the guilty until proven innocent route. They're not into a balance or just punishment system. They just want their cute little niche group of thinskins playing. Rough dayz.
To be honest I agree with you. Cursing and some amount of toxicity is found in games no matter how much you ban or restrict. If you don't like cursing there is a literal option just to bleep it out.
go play a different game
not alot of good games on a mac laptop
oh well

try steam

Im a billionaire on Transport Fever
Welp wether you think deserve it or not I learned from my mistakes and have been given a second chance so yea thanks riot for understanding. Thanks for helping me take out my frustration.
The chat logs says it all. You have no one to blame but yourself. Good riddance.

No it really doesn't. All it shows is one side of the story but as I've said multiple times in many posts yes I did get mad but take it with a grain of salt since you don't know the full story. Assumptions make a ass out of you and me buddy

Full story or not that's no excuse and you know it. Just the side story you posted shows how 
negative and toxic you are. Even if Riot reads one side or the full story, they'll go back and watch your game and see if you're telling the truth. And if they find out your lying, you'll make an even bigger ass out of yourself. You couldn't keep your anger under control and you were punished with a ban. I see no mistakes and I'm sure Riot doesn't either. Deal with it.
